author: Al Jazeera
title: 'Pearl Harbor, 9/11 moment' as coronavirus batters the US
description: Nation's top doctor issues dire warning as virus expected to inflict mass casualties in the United States this week.
content:
Americans should get ready for a 9/11 and Pearl Harbor-type death toll in the coming week as coronavirus kills a "shocking" number of people, United States officials have warned.
The nation's top doctor, Surgeon General Jerome Adams, said Americans should br… [+3427 chars]
